title: RIOT: please give Zyra a texture update with her rework
body:
She didn't get one with the mass TU pass when the new Rift was released and I feel like she could use one. She kind of looks like a barbie doll in-game. It would be great if she had deeper colors and looked more planty to match the awesomeness of her splash.

Just a thought.
Thanks!

replies.body: Will look into this! Thanks for the suggestion!
Pls let us know what you guys ultimately decide on :) I will love you forever :D

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=GqEPbuxd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-12T21:59:16.491+0000)
>
> Will look into this! Thanks for the suggestion!

It would be awesome to see some new fresh texture update for Zyra as she is one of the main champion in the mage update coming up. I just wish she looks a bit more plant realistic-like in "A New Dawn" cinematic. Thank you for looking into her.

She needs skins too. 
Any theme would be ok.
Zyra{{champion:143}}  was created after Lulu so she used the new system- no need for texture or visual updates
